questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What operating systems is ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor currently supported on?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What are the recommended functions for inpainting tasks?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What is the recommended controlnet end percentage for obtaining good results when inpainting drawings?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What are the installation options available for ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: How can users use the example workflow for ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What is the current issue with an empty prompt in the drawing/cartoon outpainting system?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What is the next step in improving consistency for unique in/outpaint results?

questions.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
questions.question: What inspiration was used for the creation of ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor?

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor currently only supports NVIDIA operating systems.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: For inpainting tasks, it's recommended to use the 'outpaint' function.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: The recommended controlnet end percentage for obtaining good results when inpainting drawings is 0.7-0.8.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: Users can install ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor through the ComfyUI Manager or manually by cloning the repository into the custom_nodes folder.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: Users can use the example workflow by downloading 'workflow_lama.json' and dropping it into a ComfyUI tab.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: An unusual behavior is observed when providing an empty prompt to the drawing/cartoon outpainting system. It seems to give better results when prompted with 'positive' and 'negative' respectively.

answers.subject: ComfyUI-LaMa-Preprocessor
answers.answer: The next step in improving consistency for unique in/outpaint results is to investigate and apply a color fix method.
